name: Trauma in Drama
description:
Trauma in Drama is a visual novel with memorization and rhythm game elements. Chloe is a typical high school student who is best friends with the quietest nerd. Her school just announced a very special musical, help her ace the audition and get her dream role!

This is the demo version of a much longer visual novel, currently still in production.


https://bexthehexx.graphics/games/trauma-in-drama for more info!
